code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Inventory=()=>{const[inventory,setInventory]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/inventory').then(response=>setInventory(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching inventory:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inventory",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Inventory"}),inventory.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:category.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:category.items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - ",item.quantity]},index))})]},category.id))]});};export default Inventory;
